Stay stringent on quality, flexible in its assurance

Why TechLadder?

Your organization and product need to be ready to adapt, transition, pivot and scale up or down with speed and precision while maintaining the quality you’ve worked hard to establish. Finding and onboarding the right talent for this is time-consuming and expensive.

 

TechLadder offers QE-as-a-Service, in which you can hand over the reins of quality engineering to us and get access to our domain-specific tools, test banks, accelerators, processes, and testing capacity so you can operate and scale your QA while being completely flexible.

How your business benefits

API & Web Service Testing

Automate your API and web service function, regression and performance testing.

Application Testing

Get thorough functional, regression, and performance testing for web and mobile applications.

Crowd Testing

Assess a multi-user experience with a comprehensive cross-section of sample users to test and enhance your product.

Security, Performance & Load Testing

Automate the security, performance and load testing of your applications.

Our Flexible Quality Engineering Services

Got scattered data? We’ll integrate it, streamline it, and manage the entire data lifecycle.

Functionality Testing
We perform end-to-end testing of the functionality of the API layer, including unit testing, load testing, security testing, and functional testing.
Bug Tracking
We integrate all our automated tests with bug-tracking and case management systems for a comprehensive resolution of all errors.
Experience Enhancement
We use testing mechanisms to ensure the development of outstanding customer experience.
Architecture Design
Our end-to-end performance testing and engineering services cover everything from architecture design, performance testing and even architecture redesign.

View our client case studies for a quick peek at the ROI you can expect.
